text.section:
If the Director finds that a registered cemeterian, permit holder, or any other person subject to the trust requirements of this subtitle has violated this subtitle or a regulation adopted under this subtitle, the Director may refer the matter to:
the Attorney General for civil enforcement; or
the appropriate State's Attorney for criminal prosecution.

The Attorney General may sue for and a court may grant:
injunctive or other equitable relief;
imposition of a civil penalty not exceeding $5,000; or
both.
